title: Submit new studies or modifications
text:
Do you know of a study we should add? Did we not select the most appropriate elasticity from a given paper?
Please email benzipperer@gmail.com or file an issue at the underlying Github repository.
We welcome feedback and will continue to update the database with new studies.

title: Data files
section: Citation and use of the data
text:
Citation and use of the data
If you use the data or this site in your own work, please reference or cite it:






Source



Arindrajit Dube and Ben Zipperer. 2023. Minimum wage own-wage elasticity database, Version 0.6.0. https://economic.github.io/owe

title: Data files
text:
Older versions of the data
Previous releases of the data, and the code used to generate them, are available on Github.

title: Changelog
text:
Added “year” column to data
Used weighted average for elasticities from Reich and Wursten 2023, small business paper.
Corrected elasticities from Even and Macpherson 2014.

title: Changelog
text:
Added “year” column to data
Used weighted average for elasticities from Reich and Wursten 2023, small business paper.
Corrected elasticities from Even and Macpherson 2014.

title: Changelog
text:
Version 0.5.0

Corrected employment elasticity from Dow Godøy Lowenstein Reich 2020
Added “averaged” and “owe_reported” columns to data

title: Changelog
text:
Version 0.4.0
